creditline: Gift of Beverly and John Rollwagen
description: seated Native American man with shoulder-length hair, wearing a feather headdress, shell necklaces and skirt; man has white pigments on his bare chest, arms and face; man holds two feather in his PR hand and a small bag in his PL hand
inscription:
Title, Date and Inscription

ULC, printed in brown: [Plate 408]
signed: in lower margin, printed in brown: [HóNOVI - WALPI SNAKE PRIEST, WITH TOTóKYA DAY PAINTING  From Copyright Photograph 1921 by E.S. Curtis  Photogravure Suffolk Eng. Co. Boston]
title: Hónovi--Walpi Snake Priest, with Totókya Day Painting
